manual.title: Add participant
manual.question: Add the data of the participant please

response.title: Participation request Received

content.1: Thank you for your registration! Your participation request has been successfully submitted.
content.2: You will receive a confirmation email shortly with further information and instructions.
content.3: Please also check your spam folder if the email doesn't appear in your inbox.

response.error: Unfortunately, your participation request could not be submitted. A technical error has occurred.\n\nPlease try again in a few minutes or contact support if the problem persists.

content.1: Your Registration has been completed successfully.
